title: Reports
body:
Is reporting people actually doing anything? Because there are some people who really shouldn't be playing this game.. 
Ruining 9 other people's games just because they want to "prove a point" or "Got trolled last game so fk u guys" especially if it's in ranked doesn't really seem fair.

This community is so bad man

replies.body:
compare your views to your comments in a weeks time from this post and see where you get....
in other words.....
your %%%% out of luck no one cares move the %%%% on......

plain truth nothing will change sorry
